marklogic.body:
One look at George's supporters says it all.
"Democracy is like a bus. We get on it and then get it when we Reach our destination".
Remark attributed to the Turkish PM, Mr Erdogan on the matter of his county's application to join the EU. Turkey has a population of 100million and is predominately Islamic. Britain supports the application.
Jack Straw, the Labour and Bradford MP was particularly keen. When he showed Condoleeza Rice around his 'multikulchural' constituency, she was privately shocked at seeing the Third World in a Cold climate and the almost total absence of integration with the host culture.
